results.title: For love or money
results.creator_credit: Stephen Ramsey, Robin Hughes and Film Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Working series”.
One of a series of films about attitudes to work. Deals with the satisfaction one feels when working for yourself, doing something you really enjoy, even if the money is not as much as working for an employer. A commercial artist, sign-writer and a mechanic present their viewpoints.

results.title: Careering into marriage
results.creator_credit: Susan Doring, Robin Hughes and Film Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Working series”.
One of a series of films about attitudes to work. Stresses the importance of career planning for girls, even though they may marry and leave work permanently or have a broken career. Many women become the breadwinners of their family, and others manage to successfully combine career and family.

results.title: Bundy into dreamland
results.creator_credit: Curtis Levy, Robin Hughes and Film Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Working series”.
One of a series of films about attitudes to work. Part-time musicians discuss the problems of making a reasonable living with a band. In order to earn a living they must work at other, more mundane jobs, such as in a factory or a production line. They pursue their musical careers at nights.

group_works.title: Jim Pallas: electronic sculptor
group_works.creator_credit: Sue Marx and Marx Handley Productions

results.title: Jim Pallas: electronic sculptor
results.creator_credit: Sue Marx and Marx Handley Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Working Artists”.
Jim Pallas assembles fantastic sculptures which move and light up as they respond to heat, sound and motion. The film follows Pallas as he creates new pieces, describes finished work and explains the philosophy behind his art. In the final sequence, Pallas attends the unveiling of his latest work which displays intricate light patterns triggered by the movement of dancers.
results.description:

results.title: Planing machines
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Woodworking machinery series”.
A surface planing machine is shown in use. Its principle is explained by animated diagrams. The method of sharpening cutters by machine is demonstrated.

results.title: Circular saws
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Woodworking machinery series”.
The film starts with a short description of a saw bench and stresses the point that saws must be kept sharp. Machine sharpening is demonstrated, followed by hand sharpening and setting. Special types of saws, inserted tooth saw, swage saw and novelty tooth saw, are described. After sharpening, the rip saw is replaced on its spindle and packing inserted. Safety precautions saw guard, riving knife and push stick, are shown. A cross-cut saw is demonstrated. Adjustment for angle cutting, use of trenching heads for cutting housings.

results.title: Vertical spindle moulding machine
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Woodworking machinery series”
Short description of machine, moulding and rabbeting stiles, rails and bar of sash. Setting the cutters, use of face board. Franking, cutting tenons to length. Other uses, the Whitehall cutter block, French or slotted head.

results.title: Woodworking machinery series
results.creator_credit: Topical Film Company and Brent Productions
results.brief_description: Each film in this series is a complete unit in itself. The series of four films gives a basic training in the use of woodworking machinery.

group_works.title: Setting out, mortising, tenoning, band saw

results.title: Setting out, mortising, tenoning, band saw
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Woodworking machinery series”.
Shows and demonstrates the following: Job set out on rod; surfaces of members selected and marked for position of mortises; operation of mortising machine, first chisel and auger, then chain cutter; tenoning machine, explained and shown at work; cutters are shaped by grinding; the machine is set up and work carried out; the band saw is described and seen at work; the method of fitting a new saw is demonstrated; bevel cutting is shown.
results.description:
